title: Alpha Client game clips
body: Anyone using the Alpha Client and recording game clips with the replay system but getting really bad audio? Along with that really poor quality?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
I never thought something so nostalgic could also sound so painful.    I don't know what the deal with that is, I'm afraid.  I recommend posting about it on the [client boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)so the devs can take a look.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jEzXjJN1RH0
Right? Thank you, I have posted this on the other board along with a recent clip sounding even worse.
